content: I think it's a good idea to pack a spare set of clothes, especially since I've had experiences with lost luggage before. For my trip to Boston, I had to pack really light because I was only taking a carry-on, so I didn't have a spare set of clothes with me. But this time, I'll make sure to pack a spare pair of socks, undergarments, and a lightweight top, just in case. Thanks for the advice!
